/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. A white car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. On either side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban environment. The image is bathed in bright sunlight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
